data.title: Lake Geneva School of Cooking
data.meta_description: The Lake Geneva School of Cooking offers entertaining, culinary classes for the cooking enthusiast, whether novice or gourmet. We're the perfect location for Corporate Events, Private Cooking Classes or just a fun weekend activity.
data.text:
Join The Lake Geneva School of Cooking as we celebrate dining around the world!

A culinary field trip to any new city or country is always about the dining experience. At the Lake Geneva School of Cooking we will explore cuisine from Paris, Napa Valley, Tuscany, our Americana, local Lake Geneva and Holidays.

​

Dinner Time, Wine Time takes you cities around the world and offers a menu that is sure to inspire a return trip!

Enjoy a Sparkling Wine Reception with cheese Popovers, as the Chef introduces himself and his staff and reviews the “city themed” menu, and demonstrates a few basic cuts and important safety techniques before getting broken up into teams.

Then let the "hands-on" cooking begin as you slice, dice, chop, laugh, and dance while each team creates a delicious dish from each city’s four-course menu under the guidance of Chef and the Lake Geneva School of Cooking staff.

After all the cooking is done, everyone will sit down for a fine dining experience with a gourmet meal that you helped create.

Dinner Time, Wine Time! Dining Themes

Americana, Napa Valley, Paris, Tuscany and Celebrating Holidays

Take a culinary field trip as we put together menu highlighting the regions’ Classic dishes and match it with excellent wine.

​

Saturday, July 20th - Americana

Saturday, July 27th - Hawaii

Saturday, August 3rd - Paris

Friday, August 9th - Hawaii

Saturday, August 10th - Lake Geneva

Friday, August 23rd - Tuscany

Saturday, August 24th - Lake Geneva

Saturday, August 31st - Caymus Vineyards

Classes are held 6:00 pm– 10:00 pm

​

Warm weather brings outdoor activities and nothing says

“The great outdoors” ~ like the Thrill of Grilling!

From appetizer to dessert, we'll keep you

fired up about Grilling!

​

Start your Thrill of the Grill class with a Sparkling Wine Reception with Parmigiano Popovers while Chef introduces himself and the team, reviews some favorite grilling recipes, demonstrates some basic cuts and reviews important safety techniques before breaking the class into cooking teams.

Then let the "Hands-On" cooking begin, as you learn professional techniques for charring and searing as well as mastering how to keep meats, seafood, fruits, and vegetables

tender, juicy, and flavorful.

After all the cooking is done, everyone will sit down for a fine dining experience with a

gourmet meal that will be sure to make you feel like a true

"King of the Grill".

Thrill of the Grill

Friday, July 26th

Friday, September 27th

Classes are held 6:00 pm – 10:00 pm

$150 per person

Whether your child is interested in becoming a chef or just wants to cook cool food, this class is designed with the young chef in mind!

Open to children between the ages of 4 and 16, this class is exciting and educational for everyone. Moms and Dads can drop off the kids and enjoy their own lunch and shopping in Lake Geneva.

In this “Hands-On Class”, kids will be able to learn the importance of proper nutrition while enjoying the freedom to create a well-balanced meal.

After everyone is done cooking, we will sit down for a family style lunch where the children will learn and discuss 12 Basic Table Manners for Kids. It’s a great way for children to make new friends and explore a new activity in a fun, controlled environment where we don’t mind a mess!

Classes will be held on the selected following dates:

Session I: Tuesday & Wednesday, June 25th / 26th

Session II: Tuesday & Wednesday, July 9th / 10th

Session III: Tuesday & Wednesday, July 23rd / 24th

Session IV: Tuesday & Wednesday, July 30th / 31st

This class is presented as a 2-day session

Classes are held each day 11:00 am – 2:00pm

$150 per person
